title: Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer
description: On Instagram, Patti LuPone apologized after 500 Broadway artists asked her to stop bullying her fellow artists. The post Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer appeared first on AV Club.
author: Matt Schimkowitz

title: Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt
description: Author Alan Sepinwall talks to series co-creator Peter Gould in this excerpt from The Complete Critical Companion To Better Call Saul. The post Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt appeared first on AV Club.

title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch

title: Will The Chi’s Tiff Choose Victor or Nuck? ‘It’s Complicated,’ EP Justin Hillian Says
description: The biggest deal to happen in this week’s The Chi? Emmett surviving Reg’s gunshot and, upon waking in the hospital, immediately asking Kiesha to marry him. A close second, at least in our eyes? Yet another development in the Tiffany-Nuck-Victor love triangle, as she pushed Victor away for keeping a major secret from her. “Why […]
author: Kimberly Roots

title: Dexter: Resurrection Premiere: Jack Alcott Reacts to the Season’s Gruesome First Kill — Watch
description: The following contains spoilers for the season premiere of Dexter: Resurrection. Dexter Morgan’s bound to drop a few bodies in his new series Dexter: Resurrection, but in Friday’s premiere, it was another Morgan that drew first blood. When we pick back up with the Bay Harbor Butcher, he’s waking up from a coma after nearly […]
author: Nick Caruso
